author: Staff Reporter
text:
BSNL, Vellore in coordination with Taluk Legal Services Committee, Polur is conducting a Lok Adalat on February 27 to realise the outstanding dues from defaulters of Polur and connected areas.

It will be conducted from 10 a.m. at the Taluk Legal Services Committee, District Munsif Court, Polur. The committee will review the defaulter cases of landline and WLL (Wireless Loop) to settle the outstanding dues mutually to avoid further legal action. Defaulters, who have been summoned, and others with any dispute can avail of this opportunity and attend the Lok Adalat. Defaulters have been asked to come prepared for spot payments/settlement, a press release said.
title: BSNL Lok Adalat on February 27
